entry.title: 7 API Design Anti-Patterns That Will Ruin Your Architecture
entry.summary: A well-designed API is a joy to use. A poorly designed one? It’s a source of endless frustration, bugs, and wasted developer hours. Here are the most common API design mistakes I’ve encountered—and how to avoid them.
